Class PDF

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    This class create the document PDF with the quality report

    1.9.2

    Michael García Rodríguez

      • addTableScores

        public void addTableScores(List<Double> scores,
                           ResourceBundle messages,
                           int size,
                           int color,
                           int[] position)
        this methos add the summary score table.
        Parameters:
        scores - all scores obtains in tableScore
        messages - with all strings needed to build the table
        size - Text size in headers
        color - Color of the text headers
        position - position in the array of the corresponding score obtain in this metric

      • addFinalSummary

        public void addFinalSummary(List<Double> fileScores,
                            List<String> fileNames,
                            ResourceBundle messages)
        This method add a summary information about the file names with the scores obtains by each file of analysed software.
        Parameters:
        fileScores - list with all scores for each file analysed
        fileNames - list with all names for each file analysed
        messages - with all strings necessaries to summary
